name: Glitchrun
description:
EPILEPTIC WARNING!

This game consists of rapid changing colors and patterns and might trigger epilepsy!

EPILEPTIC WARNING!

Battle your friends to see who is the best at dodging glitches and get through the glitched 2.5D deathrun course!

What you see on your screen might not be on the other players screens!, So look at the others screens while keeping the lead!

OBS!

Made for 1-4 controllers (Keyboard is not mapped!)
